songs.title: Too Much (More Is the Cure)
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Four, three, two, one

[Verse 1]
Boys and hungry hearts
Know just what they want
And I'm like that
I'm not the kind of girl
To live with black
I don't hold back
Glamorous dreamer
Good to go
What you got, just bring it on..oh oh

[Chorus]
Too much is never gonna be too much
It's never even enough
Boys, toys, money all the stuff I love
It's all in good fun
More is the cure
More is my friend
And I'm gonna get it
And get it again
Uh huh I'm never gonna give it up oh oh oh oh

[Verse 2]
I like clubs in London
And the south of France
A punk delight
It's free so Google me
And watch me dance
I go all night
I can't be bought
But never know what I'll buy
'Cause I always make sure I'm satisfied oh oh

[Chorus]
Too much is never gonna be too much
It's never even enough
Boys, toys, money all the stuff I love
It's all in good fun
More is the cure
More is my friend
And I'm gonna get it
And get it again
Uh huh I'm never gonna give it up oh oh oh oh

[Bridge]
On a mission
No permission
Pull the ignition
Go!!!

[Chorus]
Too much is never gonna be too much
It's never even enough
Boys, toys, money all the stuff I love
It's all in good fun
More is the cure
More is my friend
And I'm gonna get it
And get it again
Uh huh, I'm never gonna give it up oh oh oh oh
